General.Name: Gungnir Resources Inc
General.Description: Gungnir Resources Inc., a junior mineral exploration company, engages in the acquisition, evaluation, and exploration of mineral properties. The company primarily explores for gold, nickel, copper, cobalt, and base metals. It holds 100% interest in Lappvattnet and Rormyrberget nickel deposits covering an area of 471.3 hectares located in the eastern part of the Vasterbotten District; holds interest in Knaften property that covers an area of approximately 4,887 hectares located in northern Sweden; and Hemberget Property project located in northern Sweden. Gungnir Resources Inc. was founded in 1966 and is based in Surrey, Canada.

0.Name: Mr. Jari  Paakki B.Sc., M.Sc., P. Geo., P.Geo.
